titleStmt.title: Catharos. Diogenes in his singularitie Wherein is comprehended his merrie baighting fit for all mens benefits: christened by him, a nettle for nice noses. By T.L. of Lincolns Inne, Gent: 1591.
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by VVilliam Hoskins & Iohn Danter, for Iohn Busbie,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A nettle for nice noses.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
